headline: MPC Ranks as One of America's Most JUST Companies
summary: Key Points Marathon Petroleum Corp. (MPC) was named one of America's Most JUST Companies by JUST Capital and CNBC, ranking 35th out of 940 companies and leading the oil and gas industry for the second consecutive year. MPC's recognition highlights ...
